title: Prompt Engineering Practices
description: An interactive infographic providing a quick reference for crafting effective MicroSim generation prompts, organized into five expandable sections covering context setting, specification depth, technical constraints, examples and patterns, and output format, with good and bad examples for each practice.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Education
Prompt Engineering
AI-Assisted Development
MicroSim Generation
learningObjectives: Identify the five key categories of effective MicroSim generation prompts
Distinguish between good and bad prompt examples for each category
Apply the checklist when crafting new MicroSim prompts
Understand the relative impact of different prompt elements on generation success
prerequisites: Basic understanding of AI prompt engineering

controls.description: Click section headers to expand/collapse practice categories
Hover over checklist items to see good and bad examples
